data.title: Last Name Orsini: origin, history, and heritage
data.meta_description: Discover the origin and history of the last name Orsini. Learn more about the origin of your last name, its history, and your family heritage.
data.text:
The last name "Orsini" originates from Italy. It is believed to have derived from the Latin name "Ursus," meaning "bear," which then evolved into "Orsa" or "Orso" in Italian. The surname "Orsini" likely originated as a patronymic surname, indicating descent from someone named Orso or Orsa. The Orsini family is an influential Italian noble family that dates back to the Middle Ages, and members of this noble family have held significant positions in politics, military, and the Church throughout history.

To learn more and discover fascinating details, unlock the full content.
